attributes.action: intervene in the case of imprisoned Samantha Orobator in Laos ensuring that her basic human rights are met and demanding an explanation from the Lao government as to why her defence team have not had the opportunity of meeting her and preparing an adequate case
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The case of Samantha Orobator is an example of the disgusting behaviour of the Lao government in not only not informing the British authorities of her detention but not allowing her legal team adequate time to prepare a defence by bringing forward her trial date by a year. This woman's life and the life of her unborn child are hanging in the balance and we urge the Prime Minister to take action to demand an explanation from the Lao government and in the event of her being found guilty to negotiate her return to the United Kingdom

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
